Harbor of Stone and Contracts
Mines and Quarries provide +1 [ICON_Production] Production, receive additional +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture if built on a resource and additional +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold in cities with a Liyue Harbor.
Liyue Harbor

A district unique to Liyue for naval activity in your city. Replaces the Harbor district and cheaper to build. Creates a [ICON_TradingPost] Trading Post in this city when built.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Grants +5 Loyalty per turn in this city.
Liyue unique Ancient era anti-cavalry unit that replaces the Spearman. Ignores [ICON_Movement] Movement penalties for Hills. +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when defending on Hills.
Keqing
Yuheng, the Star of Change

+2 [ICON_Movement] Movement for all civilian units. Civilian units ignore [ICON_Movement] Movement costs of terrain, features and crossing rivers. Builders receive 2 less build charges. Receive 2 additional Builders or Military Engineers each time you train one. One extra Wildcard policy slot in any government.

Keqing, Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing, the future of Liyue lies in your hands. You are representation of your people, and make your decisions lightning fast like a driving thunder. Under your leadership, your people will rewrite the old order existed for millennia, replace the gods as masters of your own universe, and stand the test of time. Stay at the cutting edge in eras, create a new path with your own hands, and make your thoughts into actions.
Ningguang
Tianquan, the Star of All-Seeing

Receive an extra level of [ICON_VisLimited] Diplomatic Visibility for having an international [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route to a civilization. All spies start with a free Surveillance promotion. +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture, +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith and +50% [ICON_Gold] Gold from international [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes.

Ningguang, Tianquan of the Liyue Qixing, you knows all details about good and bad things in Liyue. You are kind toward your people, but a perfect hunter that none of your enemy could ever hope to see, and unsurpassed in all of Teyvat. Continue investing, expand trade routes, and develop the Jade Chamber so that it can casts its shadow over the whole of Liyue in the moonlight.
